title: With J.P. Marceau: All God's Creatures in a Suffering World
description:
J.P. and I are back together again for a wide ranging conversation about our lives during the Corona apocalypse, the human place in nature, and how we can unite our suffering to Christ.

J.P. Marceau's Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZzlvx0HHYiPOJTEOU399WA
How to pronounce my last name: The "c" is silent just to confuse people.
My series on chickens and our food system: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPDXZ3FC6Ie3_uO747tbGUEMGiBJR1SA1
